q: Reminded that his predecessor Robert McNamara said, "we were wrong, terribly wrong," decades after Vietnam, Donald Rumsfeld rejected the comparison. "That's not the case with Iraq," he said. I think the world's a better place with Saddam Hussein gone and with the Taliban gone and al-Qaida out of Afghanistan.
